ONE.graphic_title: Fifty poorest counties in the U.S.
ONE.prose: This radial bar chart shows the 50 counties in the U.S., including Puerto Rico, with the highest percentage of residents living below the poverty line in 2016. All but one, Oglala Lakota County, South Dakota, is in Puerto Rico.
ONE.source: U.S. Census Bureau 2016 American Community Survey 5-year estimates

TWO.prose: This radial bar chart shows the 50 counties in the U.S., including Puerto Rico, ranked 51st to 100th in highest percentage of residents living below the poverty line in 2016.
TWO.source: U.S. Census Bureau 2016 American Community Survey 5-year estimates

THREE.graphic_title: 100 poorest counties in U.S. minus Puerto Rico
THREE.prose: This radial bar chart shows the 100 counties in the U.S., not including Puerto Rico, with the highest percentage of residents living below the poverty line in 2016.
THREE.source: U.S. Census Bureau 2016 American Community Survey 5-year estimates
